items.content_html:
RTâ€‚Eva Foğ• ğŸ¦Š Claudius Nero's Legion
Elon Musk: Starlink is going to do a tremendous amount of good

â€œStarlink is good in and of itself. The Starlink system provides low-cost, high-bandwidth connectivity anywhere in the world. It's the first truly global Internet system.

And I think it's helping a lot of people around the world who either don't have access to connectivity, or it's too expensive. You know, once you have access to the Internet, you can learn anything. You can sell your products and services to the rest of the world.

So, I think Starlink actually is going to do a tremendous amount of good in lifting people out of poverty and helping them.â€

items.title: RT Dane: Rachael Anderson would have turned 32 yrs old this coming Wednesday, but that will never happen, she was murdered in 2018 by a complete stran...
items.content_html:
RTâ€‚Dane
Rachael Anderson would have turned 32 yrs old this coming Wednesday, but that will never happen, she was murdered in 2018 by a complete stranger.

Anthony Pardon broke into Rachael's apartment, hogtied her, gagged her, raped, strangled, beat, & stabbed her over 50X with a steak knife in the head, all on her 24th birthday.

Anthony Pardon, who brutally raped & murdered Rachael Anderson, had a horrific rap sheet which included:

1. Conviction for raping a 9-month-old infant

2. Convictions for aggravated robbery, more rapes, attempted murder

3. Registered sex offender + GPS monitored

4. Repeat violent offender

In what universe does an animal like that get another chance? Not in mine. Yet he was released from prison, and he started raping and killing (immediately) all over again.

RIP Rachael
